author: I. Kraegen
title: Delivering digestible information
content:
Readers suffer from too much information available online. Saving time for users by deliverying concise and insightful information is the biggest mission for media companies. Digiday Japan, has 'Read all in 1min' function, which collapses each story to create a single page feed of digestable shorter stories.

The article page of Digiday Japan. 'Read all in 1min' is OFF as a default.
The article page of Digiday Japan. 'Read all in 1min' is turned ON.

Unlike 'fast FT', where readers see the list of short headlines first, readers see a full-length article first in Digiday Japan. This way, it conveys how depths each article gets to before leading them to browse short summaries of related stories.

fastFT where users see list of headlines first.
